alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of DeKalb County through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Redan, or 8 miles northwest of Conyers, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Doraville, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Tucker, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, North Druid Hills, Belmont, Arabia Mountain, Redan, Scottdale, Kirkwood and Panthersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
